name: Go! Go! Break Steady
description: Local Multiplayer 2, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2, HD (High Definition). Upgrade to the full version of Go! Go! Break Steady and unlock all 30 rounds of the Break Steady Tournament. Play solo, cooperate with friends, or challenge the world with your rhythm and smarts! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
